content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
December 9, 2019
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:J. Brett Blanton, of Virginia, to be Architect of the Capitol for the term of ten years, vice Stephen T. Ayers.Finch Fulton, of Alabama, to be an Assistant Secretary of Transportation, vice Carlos A. Monje, Jr.James E. McPherson, of Virginia, to be Under Secretary of the Army, vice Ryan McCarthy, resigned.
